original_text: To Kohath belonged the clan of the Amramites and the clan of the Izharites and the clan of the Hebronites and the clan of the Uzzielites; these are the clans of the Kohathites.
korean_text: 고핫에게서는 아므람 종족과 이스할 종족과 헤브론 종족과 웃시엘 종족이 났으니 이들은 곧 고핫 종족들이라

sentences.original_text: To Kohath belonged the clan of the Amramites
and the clan of the Izharites
and the clan of the Hebronites
and the clan of the Uzzielites
these are the clans of the Kohathites
